description: Cashfree Payments integration for processing payments, refunds, and managing payment links and cashgrams.

actions.name: cancel-payment-link
actions.description: Cancel a payment link in Cashfree Payment Gateway. Only links in ACTIVE status can be cancelled.

actions.name: create-cashgram
actions.description: Create a Cashgram for instant money transfers using Cashfree

actions.name: create-order
actions.description: Creates an order in Cashfree Payment Gateway

actions.name: create-payment-link
actions.description: Creates a payment link in Cashfree Payment Gateway

actions.name: create-refund
actions.description: Initiate a refund for a Cashfree order. Refunds can only be initiated within six months of the original transaction.

actions.name: deactivate-cashgram
actions.description: Deactivate a Cashgram to prevent further redemptions using Cashfree

actions.name: fetch-payment-link-details
actions.description: View all details and status of a payment link in Cashfree Payment Gateway

actions.name: get-all-refunds-for-order
actions.description: Fetch all refunds processed against an order in Cashfree Payment Gateway

actions.name: get-orders-for-payment-link
actions.description: View all order details for a payment link in Cashfree Payment Gateway
